Thank for supporting PlayMemories "Home For Halloween" Photo Contest Event.
The event ended on November 14th and finally top 10 creations have been announced!
They are awesome so let’s give all the winners a big applause!
・PlayMemories app is available at PlayStation®Store!

感謝您對PlayMemories「萬聖節之家」照相大賽的支持。
此活動已在11月14日結束，前10名得獎作品也已宣布！
所有得獎作品皆為佳作，在此恭喜所有得獎的贏家。
●PlayMemories程式可於PlayStation®Store下載。

ITEM.TEXT: Winter Holiday Special presented by Granzella!
由Granzella呈獻的冬日假期特別！

DESCRIPTION.BODY: The end of year & New Year’s Event presented by Granzella!\nGranzella’s Southern Island Hideaway & Edo of Nippon lounges are going to have New Year’s version from New Year’s Day! Let’s visit with your friends on the New Year’s Eve and count down to the New Year 2013!\nYou can also join the New Year countdown at My Private Hideaway personal space, if you already own it. New Year’s house party would be an awesome idea, don’t you think?
由Granzella呈獻的年末和新年活動！\n日本大江戶和南島秘密樂園將由新一年起以新年版本示人！於除夕到訪那些大廳和朋友一起倒數，迎接2013年！\n如果你擁有私人秘密樂園，你亦可以在那裡倒數新年。在家中舉行新年派對是個很好的構思，不是嗎？

The end of year & New Year’s Event presented by Granzella! 
Granzella’s Southern Island Hideaway & Edo of Nippon lounges are going to have New Year’s version from New Year’s Day! Let’s visit with your friends on the New Year’s Eve and count down to the New Year 2013!
You can get more information about the events by talking to people in Edo of Nippon lounge, maybe they can give you something special!?
Please listen to what they have to say then you will have your New Years’ experience, the best one ever!

由Granzella呈獻的年末和新年活動！
日本大江戶和南島秘密樂園將由新一年起以新年版本示人！於除夕到訪那些大廳和朋友一起倒數，迎接2013年！
你可以和日本大江戶大廳的人聊天，以獲知更多活動詳情，說不定他們會給你一些特別的東西？
請聽聽他們的話，然後你將度過有史以來最好的新年！

ITEM.TEXT: Winter Holiday Special presented by PlayStation®Home!
由PlayStation®Home呈獻的冬日假期特別！

DESCRIPTION.BODY: New Year’s Eve Event 2012 is held in Pier Park for this holiday season only.\nMany fun minigames are available and you can unlock special rewards by playing them!
2012年除夕活動則只在這假日季節期間於碼頭公園舉行。\n屆時有多款有趣遊戲，參與遊戲的話可以獲得特別獎品道具！

New Mini game “Go Fish!” has arrived in Shopping Mall - West!\nCatch as many fish as you can in the limited amount of time! You can get fantastic rewards just by playing the game!\nYou can purchase the related items to enjoy the game more!
新遊戲「釣魚樂」現在已在Shopping Mall - 西區登場！\n在有限時間內能釣多少魚就釣多少吧！玩此遊戲還可獲得精美獎品道具！\n您也可以購買相關道具來提升遊戲體驗！
New Open - GZ Burger!\nSpecial costumes of GZ Burger are available and it’s free for you to download!
新開幕 - GZ漢堡！\nGZ Burger有特別服裝供您免費下載。

ITEM.TEXT: The Jewel of the Skies Open House

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

<To users that have purchased nDreams Blueprint: Home>\nThe recommended furniture from Blueprint: Home on sale since December 5 is also now available at the Blueprint: Home workstation's "Recommended Furniture."\nDon't miss the chance to check them out!
<致已購入nDreams Blueprint: Home的玩家>\n於12月5日上市的Blueprint: Home特選家具現在也可從Blueprint: Home的工作站內的「Recommended Furniture」(特選家具)購入！\n別錯過這個機會！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

New companions are now available from YECK Entertainment!
They are very adorable as you will want to bring them around everywhere in PlayStation®Home once you meet them!
And more great news!
Other new friends are coming to PlayStation®Home soon!
Please look forward to seeing them too!
YECK Entertainment現已推出新的隨身夥伴！您看到他們有多可愛後，一定就會想要帶著他們在PlayStation®Home到處跑！\n還有其他好消息！\n其他新朋友將會在近期內加入PlayStation®Home！敬請以待！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

Check them out and find your favorite!
